chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem as follows:

I wake up at 9AM with 100% battery. By 9:40 AM (without using the phone), I get to 89% battery... it's draining quickly.

Thank you for your help,


Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer meets all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted.
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories as well as proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 working days to process a refund (if you're eligible).
